definitions.definition: a person who writes for newspapers or magazines or prepares news to be broadcast on radio or television.
examples: reporter, correspondent, columnist, writer, commentator, reviewer; Moreinvestigative journalist, photojournalist, newspaperman, newspaperwoman, newsman, newswoman, newshound, newshawk, hack, stringer "a Denver-based journalist who has covered business and international news for more than 25 years"Moreinvestigative journalist, photojournalist, newspaperman, newspaperwoman, newsman, newswoman, newshound, newshawk, hack, stringer a Denver-based journalist who has covered business and international news for more than 25 years
